Address.value: 6836 BEE CAVE ROAD,BUILDING III, SUITE 201, AUSTIN, Texas, 78746, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Savara Inc is a biopharmaceutical company. It is focused on rare respiratory diseases. The company's lead program, molgramostim nebulizer solution (molgramostim), is an inhaled granulocyte-macrophage colony-stimulating factor in Phase 3 development for autoimmune pulmonary alveolar proteinosis (aPAP).
